list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: implement signup feature including controller, session management, and JSP views
-Added SignupController, SignupRequestDTO, and SignupSessionMapper for signup flow. - Implemented join/verify/complete steps with session handling. - Created JSP views: join.jsp, complete.jsp

task.summary: Default task

docs: draft README for the online bookstore project
- Created the initial draft of the project README for the FastCampus Online Bookstore assignment - Planning to add UML diagrams, ERD, and API specifications in the next update

chore: ê¸°ë³¸ Maven ë””ë ‰í† ë¦¬ êµ¬ì¡° ìƒì„± (src/main/java, webapp ë“±)
- src/main/java, src/main/resources, src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/views ìƒì„± - ì•„ì§ ê¸°ëŠ¥ êµ¬í˜„ì€ ì—†ìœ¼ë©°, ì´í›„ Spring MVC êµ¬ì„± ì˜ˆì • - GitHub fork ë ˆí¬ì— ì´ˆê¸° êµ¬ì¡° ì„¸íŒ… ëª©ì

chore: update web.xml
- rename servlet and adjust dispatcher path for bookstore project

chore: configure web module and fix web resource directory for deployment
- Fixed incorrect Web Resource Directory mapping in IntelliJ - Registered src/main/webapp as the proper web root - Enabled recognition of web.xml and static/view resources - Resolved unresolved class/package errors (e.g., DispatcherServlet, ContextLoaderListener)

chore: add static resource directories and configure servlet-context.xml
- Created /static/css, /static/js, and /static/img directories under src/main/webapp - Set up mvc:resources mapping in servlet-context.xml to serve static files from /static/** - Configured component scanning for com.bookstore package - Registered InternalResourceViewResolver for JSP views under /WEB-INF/views/ - Included Swagger resource handlers for future API documentation

chore: configure Oracle XE datasource, MyBatis, and transaction in root-context.xml
- Set JDBC URL to jdbc:oracle:thin:@localhost:1521:XE - Updated driver class to oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver - Username set to 'system'
- Registered SqlSessionFactory and SqlSessionTemplate for MyBatis integration - Enabled automatic mapper scanning for com.bookstore.mapper - Configured DataSourceTransactionManager - Activated @Transactional support using annotation-driven configuration

chore: ðŸ—‘ï¸ add target/ and IDE-specific files to .gitignore
- Added .gitignore entries to exclude build output (/target/) and IDE-specific files (/workspace.xml, /dataSources/, etc.) to keep the repository clean and portable across environments.

chore: add IntelliJ project structure and DB datasource settings
-Committed IDE configuration files to maintain a consistent development setup.

config: add MyBatis config and mapper setup for user entity
- Added mybatis-config.xml with camelCase mapping enabled - Updated root-context.xml to reference MyBatis configuration - Created userMapper.xml for initial user-related SQL mapping

chore: Add Oracle JDBC and dev-friendly dependencies
- Removed MySQL driver and added Oracle JDBC (ojdbc8) to pom.xml - Added Lombok dependency for automatic getter/setter generation - Added JSTL taglibs for JSP view support - Updated DB connection username from 'system' to 'test' in root-context.xml

feat: Add global exception handling module
- Implemented ApiResponse<T> class to standardize success/failure responses - Defined ErrorCode enum with domain-specific error types - Created CustomException class that wraps ErrorCode for exception throwing - Added GlobalApiExceptionHandler for REST API-level exception handling - Added GlobalViewExceptionHandler to support JSP error page routing

feat: Add test logic for fetching writer name
- Implemented end-to-end test flow to verify DB and JSP linkage - Added UserController and UserService to fetch writer name via writerNum - Integrated MyBatis with UserMapper and userMapper.xml - Used test data from TEST.TB_WRITER table

feat: Scaffold empty domain controllers
- Added empty controller classes for each domain: Book, Cart, Order, Payment, Review - Initial scaffolding only, no endpoints implemented yet - Will be expanded later with request mapping logic

docs: Add controller layer doc and RootController
- Created controller.md to document controller layer conventions - Summarized REST vs JSP usage and annotation examples - Added RootController mapped to "/" path to test routing and view error forwarding

style: Add JSP views for main and error pages
- Added main.jsp for verifying controller-to-view data flow (e.g., writer name) - Added 404.jsp to display user-friendly not-found page - Added error.jsp to show global exception details (status, message, timestamp) - Initial static designs for verifying JSP routing and error mapping

chore:Remove tracked IntelliJ config files
-.idea configuration files previously added to Git have been untracked - These files will now be ignored according to the .gitignore rules
chore(gitignore): unify .gitignore for IDEs, build outputs, and OS files

refactor: improve ApiResponse builder methods and add @NotNull safety
- Refactored static factory methods in ApiResponse to reduce redundancy and improve readability. - Added @NotNull to errorCode parameter for safer error handling.

feat: define user domain and MyBatis mapper for user-related operations
-Added User and UserIdentityVerification entities. -Created UserMapper interface and corresponding MyBatis XML mapper for user CRUD, status update, and duplication check.

feat: implement signup feature including controller, session management, and JSP views
-Added SignupController, SignupRequestDTO, and SignupSessionMapper for signup flow. - Implemented join/verify/complete steps with session handling. - Created JSP views: join.jsp, complete.jsp
